definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

pinyin: tan1 bo2 hou4 mei3 gu3 ying2 li4

sentences.english: Diluted earnings per common share of $0.55
sentences.chinese: 普通股攤薄後每股盈利爲55美分。

sentences.english: There is no potential dilutive ordinary shares in issue during both periods.
sentences.chinese: 於期內本集團並沒有潛在攤薄普通股編制。

sentences.english: A large number of investment funds and products into, will be diluted the profits of the investment market.
sentences.chinese: 大量的投資資金和產品，將被攤薄利潤的投資市場。
